message.content: Now I'll create the `/workspace/regular_clean.sh` file:

function.arguments:
{"command": "create", "path": "/workspace/regular_clean.sh", "file_text": "#!/bin/bash

# Regular cleanup script
# This script performs basic cleanup operations

# Print start time
echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"

# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean empty directories in /tmp
find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean package manager cache
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get clean
fi

# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Print completion time
echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)""}

#!/bin/bash

# Regular cleanup script
# This script performs basic cleanup operations

# Print start time
echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"

# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean empty directories in /tmp
find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean package manager cache
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get clean
fi

# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Print completion time
echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)"

message.content: Now I'll create the `/workspace/regular_clean.sh` file:

function.arguments:
{"command": "create", "path": "/workspace/regular_clean.sh", "file_text": "#!/bin/bash

# Regular cleanup script
# This script performs basic cleanup operations

# Print start time
echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"

# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean empty directories in /tmp
find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean package manager cache
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get clean
fi

# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Print completion time
echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)""}

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/regular_clean.sh
+++ /workspace/regular_clean.sh
@@ -0,0 +1 @@
+#!/bin/bash
@@ -1,0 +3,22 @@
+# Regular cleanup script
+# This script performs basic cleanup operations
+
+# Print start time
+echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"
+
+# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
+find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null
+
+# Clean empty directories in /tmp
+find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null
+
+# Clean package manager cache
+if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
+    apt-get clean
+fi
+
+# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
+find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null
+
+# Print completion time
+echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)"

content:
-rwxr-xr-x 1 root root 579 Oct 30 13:35 /workspace/regular_clean.sh
#!/bin/bash

# Regular cleanup script
# This script performs basic cleanup operations

# Print start time
echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"

# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean empty directories in /tmp
find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean package manager cache
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get clean
fi

# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Print completion time
echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)"

#!/bin/bash

# Regular cleanup script
# This script performs basic cleanup operations

# Print start time
echo "Starting cleanup at $(date)"

# Clean temporary files older than 7 days
find /tmp -type f -atime +7 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean empty directories in /tmp
find /tmp -type d -empty -delete 2>/dev/null

# Clean package manager cache
if command -v apt-get >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    apt-get clean
fi

# Clean old log files (older than 30 days)
find /var/log -type f -name "*.log" -mtime +30 -delete 2>/dev/null

# Print completion time
echo "Cleanup completed at $(date)"
